thread.title: Airwheel X6 good quality one-wheeled Scooter Music Rocks Your Way
thread.title_full: Airwheel X6 good quality one-wheeled Scooter Music Rocks Your Way

title: Airwheel X6 good quality one-wheeled Scooter Music Rocks Your Way
text: Airwheel X6 good quality one-wheeled Scooter Music Rocks Your Way Followed by Airwheel X6, the Airwheel Technology released Airwheel X6 Music for music lovers. The importance of music in different person’s life has different importance degrees. For electric scooter lovers, so many of them are music lovers. No matter what kind of music they like, the Airwheel X6 Music will meet all demands. USA, 29 September 2015 -- Rachmaninoff, a great musician once said, “Music is enough for a lifetime, but a lifetime is not enough for music.” The importance of music in different person’s life has different importance degree. For electric self-balancing scooter lovers, so many of them are music lovers. Followed by Airwheel X6, the Airwheel Technology released Airwheel X6 Music for music lovers.There are kinds of music to meet different tastes and different age groups.Classical music, pop music, blues, rock & roll, jazz, R & B, orchestral music and contemporary music are the mainly types of music which possess a large number of audiences. There are also some less-popularized types of music, such as country music, heavy metal, vocal music, ethnic music and funk and so on so forth. Most importantly, no matter what kind of music you like, the Airwheel X6 Music single wheel electric scooter will meet all your demands. Equipped with Built-in Music Player, Airwheel X6 Music makes the Hi-Fi sound quality and stereo sound come true due to bass engine technology and inbound source. The rider can connect smart phone to the Airwheel X6 Music intelligent electric unicycle by the intelligent wireless transmission chip with the valid wireless pairing scope: 5-8m. X6 Music is equipped with latest magnetic levitation motor, which replaces the bearing with magnetic suspension and extends life expectancy. X6 Music is also armed by the most advanced processor worldwide: top architecture and significant performance improvement, capable of processing 1024 flops per second and monitoring real-time data. X6 Music self-balancing scooter has dashing black wheel hub and magnified wheel hub to reduce slant, enhance grip and ensure better safety. What’s more, X6 Music is both user-friendly and environment-friendly. As the world leader of electric self-balancing scooter industry, Airwheel is keen to bring the fun of science and technology to every corner of the world, and let people really benefit from the progress of S&T.Airwheel X6 Music rocks your way. # # #
